sub_title:
Senior Organic and Analytical Chemist ♦                           
Scientific Specialist at Eurofins PSS Insourcing Solutions
summary:
I am an experienced organic and analytical chemist, more than 25 years in industrial R&D, a real investigator with strong analytical and problem solving skills, customer-oriented and results-driven, while quality is a relevant parameter in my work. I have a rational mindset and I excel in a professional environment in which I can, in cooperation with others, make complex chemical issues applicable. External (international) contacts give it an extra dimension. 
I can handle administrative tasks accurately and efficiently, which I practiced both at work and in side activities.
I love to take part in decision-making and decision-taking, both professionally and in other activities. 

General keywords: 
Strong analytical skills – Administrative skills – Communication skills – Rational – Deliberate – Well-organized – Confident – Reliable

Technical keywords: 
Organic chemistry – analytical chemistry – pharmaceuticals - change control - PhD – organic synthesis – structure elucidation – starch-based adhesives – product development – process development – process improvement – analytical method development – chromatography – wet chemical analysis – instrumental analysis – spectroscopy – thermal analysis – SAP – quality control – problem solving – material specifications – Quality Assurance – reporting – project management – statistics
